about_the_game:
You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. You decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?

Unwind and relax as you explore colourful and atmospheric environments. No story, NPCs, cutscenes or distractions. Just you, exploring environments at your own pace. A super simple collectathon.

Features

  • A relaxing, peaceful, exploration-adventure full of enchanting detail

  • Search for hidden items and special items, spread across all seven levels

  • Steam Achievements to unlock!

  • Featuring an original score by Emmy-nominated composer Nicholas Singer
detailed_description:
You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. You decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?

Unwind and relax as you explore colourful and atmospheric environments. No story, NPCs, cutscenes or distractions. Just you, exploring environments at your own pace. A super simple collectathon.

  • Search for hidden items and special items, spread across all seven levels

fullgame.name: Lost Valley of the Frog King

name: Lost Valley of the Frog King Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10, 11
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 950 or AMD Radeon™ R7 370
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: You are the captain of an arctic expedition. Months into the voyage, you discover an uncharted island, encased in a wall of ice. As a gentleman explorer, you decide to take a closer look and meet with your boat on the far side of the island. What will you discover?
